entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:37 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
